name: NEW! - Gingerbread Cream, FOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A decadent black tea with the delicious flavors of gingerbread and cream. This is a wonderful seasonal treat that will make you think fondly of the Holidays all year round!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Holiday Winter Spice
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A favorite for a cold day! This is a bold and spicy black tea blend with orange & mandarin peels, cinnamon, and cloves. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: NEW! - Pumpkin Masala Chai, FOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Sensational black tea and chai spices  of ginger, cardamom, and cinnamon, with the decadent flavor of pumpkin pie - delicious! A tea that will make you think fondly of Fall all year round.

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Green Mango
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Quality green tea with sweet dried mango pieces, a wonderfully tropical taste! 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: NEW! - Heart Tea Strainer with Tray
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Stainless steel, Silver Heart Tea Strainer, comes with it's own tiny silver tray to set it on between brewing. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>Did you know? - These also make the perfect party favors for any occasion! Order more than 6 and receive FREE cloth gift bags and samples to make the perfect take-home treats for your guests. For more information, please contact emily@greenleafteaco.com.  


<FONT COLOR=000000>**Please note: For quantities over 6 pieces, please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery.**

name: NEW! - Pumpkin Cream, FOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Quality black tea flavored with pumpkin and cream with a subtle hint of spice. Makes a wonderful seasonal treat, and a tasty reminder of Fall year round!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: NEW! - Long Island Strawberry Green
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A refreshing combination of savory Sencha green tea, sweet dried strawberry and papaya pieces. This tea is wonderful hot or cold and bound to be your new favorite tea!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: NEW! - Green Hawaiian Coconut Creme
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Savory Chun Mei green tea deliciously flavored with toasty coconut flavors. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: NEW! - Lemon Chiffon, FOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Quality FOP black tea, flavored with lovely lemon and sweet vanilla. No need for sugar, this one is naturally scrumptious on it's own! Makes a decadent dessert with sugar and a splash of milk. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: NEW! - Coconut Creme Chai, FOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Spicy black tea with savory chai spices such as ginger, cardamom, and cinnamon, with a creamy coconut element to make you go "yumm!". 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: French Blend
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Sophisticated floral black tea blend with bergamot, jasmine, and lavender flavors. Makes a wonderfully strong brew, great with milk and sugar!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: NEW! - Assam TGFOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A beautifully rich tea with quality TGFOP tea leaves and a nice dark hue, this tea is unflavored and a naturally strong black tea. This mixes well with chopped chai mix and milk!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Hand-Crafted Tea Cozy, for 4c. Tea Pots
description: <FONT COLOR=000000>Hand-crafted, crocheted tea cozy for your 4-cup tea pot! Has a drawstring/tie closure and comes in 2 different styles. These are well crocheted and are perfect for keeping your tea warmer for a little while longer! Brought to you by Crazy Stars Handmade! (handmade.crazystars.net)

name: Hand-Crafted Tea Cozy, for 2c. Tea Pots
description: <FONT COLOR=000000>Hand-crafted, crocheted tea cozy for your 2-cup tea pot! Has a drawstring/tie closure and comes in 2 different styles. These are well crocheted and are perfect for keeping your tea warmer for a little while longer! Brought to you by Crazy Stars Handmade! (handmade.crazystars.net)

name: Hand-Crafted Mug Tea Cozy
description: <FONT COLOR=000000>Hand-crafted, crocheted cozy for your mug! Has a button clasp and comes in 4 different styles. These are well crocheted and are perfect for keeping your cup warmer for a while longer! Brought to you by Crazy Stars Handmade! (handmade.crazystars.net)

name: Coconut Grove
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A tropical black tea blend flavored with coconut and macademia nut.

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Blue Spring Oolong
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A quality oolong tea with blue mallow blossoms, makes a delicate cup with a slightly toasty flavor. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Flower Jasmine Green
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A beautifully floral Jasmine Grade #1 green tea with jasmine flower blossoms. Very fragrant, smooth but yet a very bold cup!  

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

<FONT COLOR=000000>***Temporarily sold out! Will be back in stock the beginning of January***

name: Black & White Mini Coconut Haystacks, 4 pcs.
description: <FONT COLOR=000000>Toasted coconut drenched in dark chocolate and drizzled with white chocolate, a rich and decadent treat to accompany your tea!

name: Perfect Tea Measure Spoon
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>The perfect tea measure spoon is a silver spoon that is made to measure a heaping 1 tsp., the perfect tea measurement for a cup of tea! Spoon has '1 Cup Of Perfect Tea' engraved on the handle. This is a great addition to anyone's tea accessories! 

<FONT COLOR=000000>For a limited time only! - Order a perfect tea measure spoon and receive a FREE tea ball!

name: Tea Brew Filters - 20ct.,  2-3 cup
description: <FONT COLOR=000000>Individual box of 20 disposable paper tea filters, good for single use. Each individual bag is perfect for brewing up to 3 cups of tea.

name: Tea Brew Filters 100ct, 2-3 cup
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Tea Brew Filters - 2-3 cup size, 100pcs. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>Perfect disposable filters for brewing large pots of tea to share, good for 2-3 cups of tea. 100 filters per box. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>** Made from 100% Natural Unbleached Paper, 
*** Also 100% Biodegradable and made from sustainably harvested wood.

name: Tea Brew Filters 100ct, 4-8 cup
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Tea Brew Filters - 4-8 cup size, 100pcs. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>Perfect disposable filters for brewing large pots of tea to share, good for 4-8 cups of tea. 100 filters per box. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>** Made from 100% Natural Unbleached Paper, 
*** Also 100% Biodegradable and made from sustainably harvested wood.

name: Black Maple, OP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A sweet Orange Pekoe black tea with rich maple syrup, as well as calendula and sunflower petals. This one is delicious on it's own, or a decadent treat with milk and sugar!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Chopped Chai Mix
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>This chopped Chai mix is a delicious combination of everything that makes the flavors for a traditional chai tea - ginger, cardamom, cinnamon, coriander, clove, and black pepper. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>This is just the spice mix, meant to be combined with your favorite tea flavor to make it "Chai". NO caffeine is in this mix.

name: Angel Falls Mist
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A tisane made up of dried apple, orange peel, hibiscus, and calendula flowers give this tea a naturally flavorful and slightly sweet brew - perfect on it's own, sweetened over ice, or served piping hot with cinnamon & nutmeg. Also, NO caffeine, what a winner!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Orange Blossom Oolong, FOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Oolong (FOP*) combined with a blend of green tea, black tea, jasmine blossoms, and the heavenly scent of orange blossoms. This makes a strong cup of tea with subtle hints of orange - a great morning pick-me-up!

<FONT COLOR=000000>FOP = Flowery Orange Pekoe grade

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Green Apple
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Chun Mei green tea flavored with fruity green apple, very nice over ice!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Yerba Mate w/ Lemongrass
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Green Yerba Mate with natural dried lemongrass, a refreshing duo!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Irish Breakfast, CTC
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A strong Assam black tea, made in the "Cut, Tear, Curl" (CTC) method which turns the tea leaves in to tiny "pellets". A very dark, flavorful cup, perfect with milk and sugar!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Honeybush - Organic
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Organic, pure honeybush, mildly sweet and caffeine free! No added flavors. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Scottish Caramel Pu-Erh
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Pu-Erh tea with pieces of toasted almonds and butterscotch chips makes a delicious treat!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 12-14 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Peppermint - Organic
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>All natural dried peppermint leaves, makes a naturally caffeine-free refreshment!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Chamomile Mint - Organic
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>An organic tisane of natural dried chamomile flowers and peppermint, a perfect pairing and also naturally caffeine free!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Pu-Erh Mini Toucha
description: <FONT COLOR=000000>Pu-erh tea small touchas, individually formed and wrapped. Each mini toucha is perfect for 1-2 cups of tea, and can be re-used 3-4 times each.

name: White Porcelain Tea Cup & Saucer Set - Helios
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Individual Porcelain tea cup & saucer set 

<FONT COLOR=000000>((Matching 2 cup White Porcelain Tea Pot sold seperately))

name: White Porcelain Tea Pot, Helios - 2 cup
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>White porcelain tea pot, perfect for brewing up to 2 cups of tea. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>See also the matching tea cups and saucers (listed separately or with tea pot below).

options.name: Helios Tea Pot w/ 2 Cup & Saucer Sets

name: White Porcelain Tea Cup & Saucer Set - Raffles
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Individual white porcelain tea cup & saucer set, basic round shape. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>((Matching 4 cup White Porcelain Tea Pot & Sets sold separately))

name: White Porcelain Tea Pot, Raffles - 4 cup
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>White porcelain tea pot, perfect for brewing up to 4 cups of tea. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>See also the matching tea cups and saucers (listed separately or with tea pot below).

options.name: Raffles Tea Pot,  2 Cup & Saucer Sets

name: Mesh Ball Tea Infuser - 3"
description: <FONT COLOR=000000>Large 3" mesh ball tea infuser perfect for brewing up to 4 cups of tea

name: Chocolate Macademia Coconut Cream
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A decadent black tea blend flavored with chocolate, macadamia nut, and coconut.

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Angel's Dream, FBOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Delicious FBOP* Assam black tea, green tea, cornflower petals, mallow blossoms, and natural berry flavors make this a unique blend with the wonderful taste of maple and berries. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>FBOP = Flowery Broken Orange Pekoe grade

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Indian Chai
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A unique chai tea blend made with black tea, curry, cinnamon, fenugreek, cardamom, orange peel, ginger, and other spices. Makes a very savory and aromatic brew!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Chai Spiced
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A black tea blend flavored with traditional chai spices and flavors, brews a mild and slightly sweet chai flavored tea. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Chamomile - Organic
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Organic tisane of purely dried, organic chamomile flowers. Mellow and soothing, perfect with honey!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Darjeeling-Organic, TGFOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A classic! An organic TGFOP-grade*, premium black tea from Darjeeling. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>*TGFOP = Tippy Golden Flowery Orange Pekoe

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Green Ginseng
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Green tea flavored with ginseng, an interesting flavor.

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Green Pear
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A fruity green tea blend with the flavor of sweet pears.

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Green Peach
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A fruity green tea blend flavored with sweet peach - divine over ice!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: English Breakfast, FP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A classic black tea - one of the most popular. A full-bodied Flowery Pekoe (FP*), perfect with milk & sugar!

<FONT COLOR=000000>FP = Flowery Pekoe grade

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: French Caramel Creme Brulee, FOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A quality rich FOP black tea blend flavored with decadent creamy caramel, a perfect dessert tea. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Lapsang Souchong Butterfly
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A very bold and smoky black tea, the smell is reminiscent of a campfire. A lovely choice during cold weather!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Romeo & Juliet Tea Hearts
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Green & black tea blend formed in to hearts, each heart perfect for a single cup. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Violet
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A subtle floral black tea blend flavored with violet, quite lovely with milk and a touch of sugar!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Victorian Rose
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A floral black tea blend flavored with rose. Has a lovely aroma and a subtle rose flavor.

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Spiced Ginger Peach
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A black tea blend flavored with peach and ginger spice.

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Chocolate Raspberry Truffle
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A decadent dessert blend flavored with rich chocolate & raspberry.

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Orange Cinnamon Spice, FOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A black tea blend flavored with orange and cinnamon.

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Yummy Berry
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>An explosion of wildberries awaits you in a cup of this fruity tisane of dried berries and fruits including cranberries, black currants, cherries, elderberries, apple, hibiscus, rosehip, and cornflower petals. The flavor is tart and slightly sweet, perfect with a little sweetener and served over ice. There's NO caffeine too, so perfect for the kids!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Yerba Mate w/ Peppermint
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Green Yerba Mate with dried peppermint, a very invigorating duo. Also, wonderful over ice!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Yerba Mate Roasted
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Natural Roasted Yerba Mate (no flavorings added). Great with lemon and honey added!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Peach Rooibos
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Rooibos tisane flavored with peach.

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Yerba Mate Green
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Green Yerba Mate (no flavorings added). Refreshing yet invigorating, a wonderful "pick-me-up"!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Green Genmaicha
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Quality Sencha green tea blended with toasted and popped rice, traditionally called "Popcorn Tea". Genmaicha makes a very savory delicious cup, perfect on it's own served piping hot! 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Japan Green Sencha - Organic
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Traditional loose leaf green Sencha tea. Makes a savory and refreshing brew, delicious either hot or cold. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Chamomile Lemongrass - Organic
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>An organic tisane of natural dried chamomile flowers and lemongrass, a wonderful combo over ice!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Earl Grey, OP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A classic, and everyone's favorite - traditional Orange Pekoe-grade black tea with cornflower petals, infused with the rich flavor of bergamot. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Earl Grey Raspberry, FOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A sweet black tea blend flavored with both bergamot and raspberry - a fruity twist on the classic!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Earl Grey Vanilla Cream, FOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A black tea blend with bergamot and creamy vanilla flavors, a decadent brew perfect with milk and sugar. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Peach Apricot, FOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A fruity black tea blend flavored with peach and apricot.

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Peach Melba, FOP
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>A black tea blend flavored with peach, raspberry, and coconut. A decadent, fruity combo, great hot or iced!

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Rooibos - Organic
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Organic Rooibos tisane, naturally non-caffeinated. 

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Classic Black Tea Sampler
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Sample pack of 4 different kinds of black tea. Includes 1 oz. bags of each:

<FONT COLOR=000000>* Earl Grey 
* English Breakfast 
* Assam 
* Irish Breakfast  

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Dessert Tea Sampler Set
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>Sample pack of 4 different kinds of decadently flavored black tea. Includes 1 oz. bags of each:

<FONT COLOR=000000>* French Caramel Creme Brulee
* Lemon Chiffon
* Chocolate Raspberry Truffle
* Earl Grey Vanilla Cream

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Tisane/Herbal Tea Sampler
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000> Tisane/Herbal Tea Sampler is completely caffeine free and includes 1oz. bags of these loose leaf tea varieties:

<FONT COLOR=000000> * Yummy Berry 
* Chamomile-Peppermint 
* Rooibos
* Honeybush

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. = 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)

name: Traditional Green & Oolong Sampler
description:
<FONT COLOR=000000>This Traditional Green & Oolong Tea Sampler contains 1oz. bags of these loose leaf green teas:

<FONT COLOR=000000>* Green Genmaicha, 
* Green Sencha, 
* Blue Spring Oolong, & 
* Formosa Oolong

<FONT COLOR=000000>(1 oz. loose leaf tea brews 10-12 cups of tea approx. at 1 tsp. tea per cup)
